h2_title: Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Rusty-Gold Cart
Rusty-Gold Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against toward the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the final of the Five Element Carts and will allow you to get into the Chapter's Secret Area - Bishui Cave.
## Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide

img_summary: The image depicts the Rusty-Gold Cart, a formidable boss in the game Black Myth: Wukong. The cart features a menacing, beast-like structure with chains and wheels, set in a dark, rocky environment with glowing lava. This boss fight occurs toward the end of Chapter 5 and is crucial for accessing the Chapter's Secret Area, Bishui Cave.
